about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Supermoves, composed, produced and performed by Olli Heino! Forming a tight combo of rhythm, rock and synth, Olli Heino brings the world of Supermoves to life in a pulse-pounding soundtrack perfect for your virtual (or non-virtual) running escapades.

The Supermoves original soundtrack features every musical piece in the game, including all pieces composed for each individual Level Kit in Supermoves - School, Plywood Park, Rooftops, Flatlands, Ocean, Streets and Stadium.

Available as part of the Supermoves Digital Deluxe Edition. Please do not purchase separately if you already own the Supermoves Digital Deluxe Edition or the Supermoves Digital Deluxe Edition Upgrade.

The soundtrack is provided in a 320 kbps MP3 format and an optional, high quality FLAC and WAV format. Be sure to enable "Download high quality music files" from Steam settings to download the optional WAV and FLAC editions.

name: Supermoves - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 104 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: To download the high quality music, please enable "Download high quality audio files" from Steam settings.
